title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 141.2 - Approval of the director of the budget
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 141.2 - Approval of the director of the budget

State Regulations

The written approval of the Director of the Budget will be a
general approval covering the services of all volunteer workers in a department
of the State. Such approval will remain in effect until modified or
withdrawn. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
141.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
